tasks.run-test: deno run --allow-read --allow-write -A cli/run.ts test/simple.hql && deno run -A cli/run.ts ./test/js/simple.js && deno run -A cli/run.ts ./test/js/chalk.hql
tasks.transpile-test: deno run --allow-read --allow-write cli/compile.ts test/simple.hql && deno run -A ./transpiled.js
tasks.node-test: deno run --allow-read --allow-write cli/compile.ts test/simple.hql && deno run -A ./transpiled.js && deno run -A esmbuild.ts && deno run -A --unstable dnt.ts && (cd npm && npm pack) && cd .. && (cd node && npm install ../npm/your-package-name-0.1.0.tgz && node index.mjs)
